name: G.Gun Grease Gun - Fast & Easy Greasing. 10,000psi Output. Hands Free Foot Operation & Pressure Relief Valve. Mess & Waste Free, with G.Coupler & 2m Hydraulic Hose. Heavy Duty Industrial Strength
short_description: BEST-IN-CLASS GREASER: This expertly designed device works more efficiently and easily than battery-powered, lever-operated, and pneumatic greasers for a variety of reasons. Overall, G. Gun produces more grease per pump, can hold a higher volume, has a longer 6.5-inch hose, and is foot operated. The LockNLube grease coupler provides a hands-free experience.

UNIQUE 2-STAGE PUMP: The 2-stage pump on our innovative greaser is activated by pushing down on the foot treadle. This feature extends your LockNLube grease coupler and Zerk fitting lifespan, returns grease in the hose back into the grease bucket canister, and makes for easy, pressure-free disconnection while eliminating mess on the coupler tip. It delivers over 10,000 PSI without batteries.

USE ON INDUSTRIAL EQUIPMENT: This grease gun is designed for big jobs, and with it, you will no longer have to continually change small tubes. This heavy-duty tool is an excellent device to have on a construction site or in an auto mechanic garage to be used on large machinery. It is also a great tool to have on hand at the farm for your tractor, plow, stump puller, disc harrow, or seeder.

FEATURES: This industrial grease gun comes with all the accessories you need plus a variety of features that set it apart from other greaser machines. Some of these distinguishing features include a large canister, pressure return valve, LockNLube coupler, clip-on lid, and built-in carry handle. In addition to all that, no external power or batteries are required to power this useful device.

MESS FREE: We built and tested this grease gun for the toughest environments. Big jobs can often get messy, especially when you’re working with complicated and bulky industrial supplies and machines. But the moving parts in this lubricating device create a wave action, meaning no messy follower plate is required and little to no grease is wasted.

name: LUMAX LX-1152 Black Heavy Duty Deluxe Pistol Grease Gun with 18" Flex Hose, Handy 3-Way Loading - Fill with Standard Cartridge, Suction or Bulk Fill. Convenient One-Hand Operation for Easy Greasing.
short_description: HARD-TO-REACH: Comes with 18" flex hose extension for hard-to-reach fittings. Convenience of one-hand operation for easy greasing. Fit Type: Universal Fit
OPTIMAL PERFORMANCE: Develops up to 7,000 PSI (480 Bar). Handy 3-way loading - fill with standard cartridge, suction or bulk fill. Air bleeder valve to release trapped air.

MAXIMUM PROTECTION: Chrome plated finish handle for maximum protection against corrosion. Deluxe, oil-resistant, contoured grip for comfort and firm grip. Heavy gauge steel barrel (18 G / 1.3 mm), polished inside for smoother operation.
EASY TO GRIP: Tough follower offers superior seal and eliminates grease bypass. Posi-lock follower rod with ergonomically designed T-handle provides sure-handed grip and easy filling at any position.
EXTRA STRENGHT: Heavy-duty, LuCast TM, cast-alloy head with heavier and reinforced wall thickness for extra strength. Outputs 4 oz. (115 g) of Grease per 100 Strokes.

name: Lincoln 1147 Lever-Action Manual Grease Gun with 18-inch Whip Hose and Coupler, Heavy-Duty Follower Springs, Premium Dual Lip Follower, Jam Proof Toggle, Cast Pump Head, Precision-machined Plunger
short_description: HIGH-PRESSURE LEVER-ACTION: The Lincoln 1147 Grease Gun delivers consistent, high-pressure lubrication with it is precision-machined plunger and heavy-duty follower springs. Perfect for automotive, industrial, and agricultural applications

DURABLE AND RELIABLE CONSTRUCTION: Built to last with a cast pump head and premium dual lip follower, this grease gun withstands tough environments like construction sites, factories, and marine settings, ensuring reliable performance over time

18-INCH WHIP HOSE AND COUPLER: Equipped with an 18-inch whip hose and coupler, the Lincoln 1147 allows for easy access to tight spots, making it ideal for greasing CV joints, bearings, and zerk fittings in hard-to-reach areas
JAM-PROOF TOGGLE MECHANISM: The innovative jam-proof toggle mechanism ensures smooth and continuous operation, minimizing downtime and making maintenance tasks faster and more efficient

VERSATILE APPLICATION: Suitable for a wide range of lubrication needs, from automotive repairs to maintaining industrial machinery and agricultural equipment. The Lincoln 1147 is your go-to tool for reducing friction and wear across various applications
product_description: Since 1910, agriculture, construction, industrial and vehicle service facilities require tools that withstand rugged and frequent use in demanding environments. The Lincoln 1147 heavy-duty lever-action grease gun is an industry standard and is time-tested and proven and includes an 18-inch whip hose to meet all lubrication tasks. This gun's dual lip follower virtually eliminates grease bypass allowing users full utilization of grease and provides a cleaner lubricating experience. The accessible check valve allows for easy cleaning and removal of hardened or contaminated grease and the jam-proof lever mechanism provides years of trouble-free service. At every farm, construction site, automobile repair shop and industrial plant, maintenance professionals need high quality lubrication equipment and pumping products. Lincoln offers everything you need for lubrication. Our general-purpose tools and heavy-duty pumps, hose reels, meters and controls, used fluid systems and hand-held lubrication products are the best in the industry. LINCOLN – THE BRAND THE PROS DEMAND.

short_description: ⚡Powerful 12,000 PSI for Heavy-Duty Work: J-KU grease gun delivers up to 12,000 PSI, 20% higher than typical 10,000 PSI models. ✋Cordless Convenience — No More Manual Pumping: Say goodbye to hand fatigue and slow manual work. The cordless electric design delivers instant pressure at the pull of a trigger—no pumping required. Faster, cleaner, and easier than a manual grease gun —perfect for automotive, agricultural, and industrial maintenance

🌀Flexible 39.4" Hose + 90° Coupler for Hard-to-Reach Fittings: Many grease guns lack a 39.4" hose or 90° coupler. J-KU as it can reach tight or awkward spots with the extra-long 39.4" flexible hose and 90° grease coupler adapter. Ideal for vehicles, agricultural, or construction machinery. 💡Effortless, One-Handed Operation with LED Light: Designed for comfort and control, the ergonomic grip and balanced design reduce fatigue during long use. The built-in LED light keeps fittings visible in dark engine bays or under vehicles—making maintenance easier, day or night

🔄Dual Loading Options — Cartridge or Bulk Fill: Compatible with standard 14 oz (400cc) grease cartridges or bulk grease fill. Suitable for NLGI #0, #1, and #2 grease, this electric grease gun covers the most common applications for vehicles, tractors, and heavy machinery

🧰Complete Kit for Home & Pro Maintenance: Everything you need in one kit: Grease gun, 2× 4.0Ah batteries, charger, 39.4" hose, extension pipe, 90° coupler adapter, 3 couplers (standard/tapered/quick-release), gloves, shoulder strap, and carrying case. name: LockNLube Grease Gun Coupler locks onto Zerk fittings. Grease goes in, not on the machine. World's best-selling original locking grease coupler. Rated 10,000 PSI. Long-lasting rebuildable tool.
short_description: LOCKS ON, STAYS ON, WON'T LEAK—LIKE HAVING AN EXTRA HAND! No need to hold the coupler in place while trying to grease your machinery. The LockNLube Grease Coupler locks on tight and lets you use both hands on your grease gun.
THE ONLY REBUILDABLE LOCKING COUPLER: We include a spare rebuild kit! It's like getting two couplers for the price of one.

1/8" NPT COMPATIBLE WITH ALL GREASE GUNS - BATTERY, PNEUMATIC, MANUAL: Whether you are using Grandpa’s old Alemite lever grease gun, or the latest battery or pneumatic grease guns, the LockNLube Grease Coupler can be added to upgrade your grease gun.
WORKS ON ALL ZERK FITTINGS, SAE & METRIC with a full lineup of adapters to reach any grease fighting on any machine!

EASY TO USE: Press the thumb lever to open the LockNLube’s patented jaws and attach to the Zerk. Release the thumb lever and the LockNLube locks on tight! Press the thumb lever again to easily release from the Zerk, even under pressure!

INSTALLATION NOTE : When affixing a 14 oz grease cartridge featuring a metal ring, kindly insert the opposite end into the grease gun's body initially. The metal ring facilitates effortless cartridge removal; it's not necessary to fully insert it into the body.

ROBUST GREASE GUN: The pistol-grip grease gun boasts a premium, long-lasting die-cast aluminum construction, ensuring a formidable 7000 PSI maximum working pressure and impeccable leak-proof operation.
